template1.text: A game offers a prize of {value1} dollars with probability {prob1}, and a prize of {value2} dollars with probability {prob2}. What is the expected value of playing the game?

template2.text: You are given two outcomes: outcome 1 with a value of {value1} occurring with probability {prob1}, and outcome 2 with a value of {value2} occurring with probability {prob2}. What is the expected value of the outcomes?
